title: Top Places to visit in Kovvur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Kovvur is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the Mandal headquarters of Kovvur Mandal in Kovvur revenue division.
 
Etymology
This Town was earlier referred to as Govur. According to Brahma Puranam, Kovvur(
